title: Pvp kernel stopped working
body: i get an error "pvp kernel has stopped working", "windows is looking for a solution" how do i fix this?

replies.body:
Anytime you start up the patcher, your OS needs to allow it to actually launch. If it doesn't have all the right permissions it can sometimes give you this pvp kernel error. You can use our [Permission Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure you have the correct settings.

Hit me back up if you have any trouble!
